title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item in library outline view on the first attempt
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.

OB: Unable to select the label item on the first attempt.

EB: The label item can be selected on the second attempt.

SR: 
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Select the label item in the library outline view.
